author: alexdma
msg: - ontology storage now manages Clerezza runtime exceptions with replacement policies
- rules/web RESTful resources moved to own java package

author: bhofmann
msg: changed pubsub sample to use correct shindig.container methods to retrieve specUrl based on the gadget's moduleId

author: antelder
msg: Add support for invoking a main method instead of running the Shell. That enables using 'mvn tuscany:run' instead of 'mvn exec:java' to run a Tuscany sample that runs a regular Java SE class using Tuscany

author: elecharny
msg: Removed the useless get( int ) method
